title: Modular Mastery-Based Computer Science Fundamentals for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic computer usage and logical thinking skills
context.additional_context: Modular progression aligned with self-directed learning pace in a digital device-provided environment.

learning_goals: Completion of real-world problem-solving projects using basic programming syntax (conditional statements, loops, functions).
Self-paced mastery of core concepts via modular mastery assessments (80% or higher).
Experience in team-based software development processes using collaborative tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
